title: Junior Product Developer
description: Responding to clients queries regarding products and reports. Implementing required fixes to bugs or new changes to logic through the use of Python. Using Javascript, HTML, CSS, XML and Velocity.js to create/edit dynamic document generation as well as AWS Lambda for static document generation. Creating/editing regular reports to coincide with customer needs using SQL and python.

title: Various Delivery Driver Roles
description: Delivering parcels and groceries to customers in a timely manner. Ensuring that all deliveries are made in a safe and efficient manner. Providing excellent customer service to all customers.

title: Student
description: Studied BSc Computer Science and achieved a 2:1. Developed a range of skills including programming, web development, and database management. Completed my final year project on a piano education application developed using HTML, JavaScript, Jest testing, and a MIDI keyboard.

title: Assistant Manager
description: Serving customers and organising staff. Handling deliveries, stock management, bookings, cellar management. Opening and closing of the business including handling till close downs at the end of the day.

title: Various Hospitality Roles
company: Shepherd Neame, The Spa Hotel, The Kentish Hare, Hotel Berangere, Mercure Hatfield Oak Hotel
description: Worked various roles in the hospitality industry after finishing 6th form including bar work, waiting tables, kitchen porter, restaurant and bar supervisor, and night manager. Developed excellent customer service skills and the ability to work well under pressure.
